method.text: Heat the oil in a frying pan and saute the chicken for 5 min.
Remove with a slotted spoon and leave to one side. Fry the onion and garlic for 1 min. Add courgettes and mushrooms.

Cook until the vegetables are crisp - about 3 min. Add the pasta sauce, bay leaf, tomatoes, sugar and strips of chicken. Stir until thoroughly mixed. Cook for 5 min or until heated through thoroughly. Keep warm.
Meanwhile, cook the pasta in boiling salted water until al dente. Drain and serve, topped with the chicken sauce. Sprinkle with Parmesan cheese.
